Required: Enables one or more of the testing and multilib repositories before proceeding with installation

Description: Sets the TUI language used *(make sure to use the ``lang`` value not the ``abbr``)*

Required: Bootloader to be installed *(grub being mandatory on BIOS machines)*

Description: Contains the desired disk setup to be used during installation
Parameters for disk encryption applied ontop of ``disk_config``
A string definining your machines hostname on the network *(defaults to ``archinstall``)*

column8: Defines which kernels should be installed and setup in the boot loader options

Description: Custom commands that will be run post-install chrooted inside the installed system

Required: Sets various mirrors *(defaults to ISO's ``/etc/pacman.d/mirrors`` if not defined)*

Description: Sets which type of *(if any)* network configuration should be used

Required: enables or disables certain online checks such as mirror reachability etc

column5: A list of packages to install during installation

Description: sets a given number of paralell downloads to be used by `pacman <https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Pacman#Enabling_parallel_downloads>`_
Installs a given profile if defined

column7: When used to autorun an installation!
column8: this sets which script to autorun with

Required: disables or enables user questions using the TUI

Description: sets a timezone for the installed system
